page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: Howick has a Women's Institute that meets once a month in the village hall.There is also a cricket club to which many people from Longhoughton belong.These two clubs join together in the summer to run a barbecue and dance and in the winter they run a Christmas family party and dance. Longhoughton also has a Women's Institute.There is also a leek club, which has an annual show;a gardening club;a magazine club,run by R.A.F.wives;and a dog_training club which meets during the summer months on the sports field.Wolf Cubs,Brownies and Guides meet weekly and are very popular with the younger children. Longhoughton Church also has a choir and a Sunday School.
